// -> e.g. ["contracts/Mailbox.sol:MailboxDynamic"] or ["contracts/Mailbox.sol:Mailbox"]
(await artifacts.getAllFullyQualifiedNames()).filter(n => n.includes("Mailbox.sol"))
await c.sendJson.populateTransaction("0x" + "11".repeat(20), "", "{}");  // should succeed (populate only)
const c = new ethers.Contract("0xeCA797E6a2D156E93f48aD70D397F5baa613C0d5", abi, (await ethers.getSigners())[0]);
const abi = ["function sendJson(address,string,string)"];
// Does it look like your MailboxDynamic?
// -> should start with "0x60". If it's "0x", that address isn't a contract.
(await ethers.provider.getCode("0xeCA797E6a2D156E93f48aD70D397F5baa613C0d5")).slice(0,10)
// Is there bytecode at the address?
